name: My Company And I Fell Into An RPG
name_original: My Company And I Fell Into An RPG
description:
This Demo takes place throughout the first half of the first arc where you play as Kurt.

Our first game, set in a fantasy-medieval world with pixel art graphics, is to be the establishment of our company’s early steps into the games industry… or so we thought until the game transported myself and my company (including our cat and music composers) into it!

With the eight of us in a world we created, we must now traverse our own game with the hope of finding our friends and a way back to our reality…

Or do we have enough time to mess about as adventurers?

Features:

  • Classic RPG experience!
  • Play through five characters, each with their own respective arcs!
  • Humour, memeage and silliness!
  • A story-driven game, so no dull grinding!
  • Optional side-quests to discover!
  • A compulsory beach scene!
  • Original composed soundtrack!

If you find any bugs please report them to: https://xvisioninteractive.com/issue-report
